variables.name: goal
variables.example: Build lean muscle and improve overall strength

variables.name: equipment
variables.description: Available gym or home workout gear
variables.example: Dumbbells, barbell, pull-up bar, resistance bands

idealOutput:
Day 1: Upper Body Push

**Warm-up (10 min):**
- Arm Circles: 2×15 each direction
- Band Pull-Apart: 3×15
- Wall Slides: 2×12

**Main Workout (45 min):**
1. Barbell Bench Press: 4×8 (90s rest)
2. Dumbbell Incline Press: 3×10 (60s rest)
3. Overhead Press: 3×8 (90s rest)
4. Tricep Dips: 3×12 (60s rest)
5. Push-up Hold: 3×30s

**Cool-down (5 min):**
- Chest Stretch: 2×30s
- Tricep Stretch: 2×30s

> *Tip:* Keep your elbows tucked at ~45° on bench press to protect shoulders.

---

Day 2: Lower Body Strength

**Warm-up (10 min):**
- Leg Swings: 2×15 each leg
- Bodyweight Squats: 2×20
- Hip Circles: 2×10 each direction

**Main Workout (45 min):**
1. Back Squat: 4×6 (120s rest)
2. Romanian Deadlift: 3×8 (90s rest)
3. Walking Lunges: 3×12 each leg (60s rest)
4. Goblet Squat: 3×10 (60s rest)
5. Calf Raises: 4×15 (45s rest)

**Cool-down (5 min):**
- Hamstring Stretch: 2×30s each leg
- Quad Stretch: 2×30s each leg

> *Tip:* Drive through your heels and keep chest up on squats.

---

*(…and so on for Days 3–7, covering pull, full-body, HIIT, mobility, and active rest.)*
